lead_paragraph: News America Marketing, a division of the News Corporation that publishes coupon inserts for newspapers, settled lawsuits by Valassis, a competitor in Michigan.
snippet: News America Marketing, a division of the News Corporation that publishes coupon inserts for newspapers, settled lawsuits by Valassis, a competitor in Michigan.

headline.main: News America Unit of News Corp. Settles Marketing Dispute
headline.seo: News America Unit of News Corp. Settles Marketing Dispute
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Unit to Pay $500 Million to Settle Accusations by a Marketing Rival
